title: Scrimshaw with soapstone base
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

see Signed on bottom, incised: [DAVIDEE - ITUBU / LAKE HARBOU
description: incised walrus tusk with attached green irregularly-shaped stone base; black organic bloom-like coloring on one side of base; designs on tusk include seated and standing Inuit figures wearing parkas and boots, bear, walrus, geese, fish, seal, dog or wolf, head of a wild cat
